messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] a question about bushido the martail arts classes
messages.msgSnippet: As you have internet I suggest looking up kendo or iai clubs in your area. If you only have a fleeting movie/video game inspired intrest then i suggest your
messages.messageBody:
As you have internet I suggest looking up kendo or iai clubs in your area. If you only have a fleeting movie/video game inspired intrest then i suggest your cash is used elsewhere. I would recommend buying some books and reading up on the subject and possibly observing a class or two just to be sure its what you want.

mounth and for an adult because im 14.
